channel.title: conference on Tom Elliott
channel.description: Recent content in conference on Tom Elliott

item.title: Visualisation driven analytics
item.description: The utility of data resources is often limited by technical barriers to accessing and analysing the available data. In response to this need, we have developed two software tools that reduce the cost, security, and skill restrictions affecting the use of data. Both tools are developed using the R software platform. The first software tool is ‘iNZight’—an R-based freeware package that provides a mouse-driven user interface to a wide range of R packages for analysis and graphics.

item.title: Predicting bus arrival in real-time (is hard)
item.description: In which I give a very basic overview of my main methods and results in a quick 15-minute presentation at the 2020 NZSA UnConference! For more details, you may consult my thesis (code and PDF available from tmelliott/phd-thesis).

item.title: Historical data based priors for better bus arrival-time prediction
How can we improve bus ETAs?
Real-time transit network modeling for improved arrival time predictions
